trans-unit.source: Serves as a repository for information about the views supported by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> or classes that inherit from it.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> class by using an integer, a string, and an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
The integer identifier for the designer view.
The string that specifies the name of the designer view.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> associated with the designer view.
viewId or text contains `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> class by using an integer, a string, an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, and an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The integer identifier for the designer view.
The string that specifies the name of the designer view.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> associated with the designer view.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the designer view.
viewId, text, or associatedDesigner contains `null`.
Gets the activity designer associated with the designer view.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to the current designer view.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.Equals%2A> uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.ViewId%2A> property to determine whether the compared designer views are equal.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref>.
`true` if obj and the current are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> and is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref>.
Gets the image associated with the designer view.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref>.
Notifies the designer when the view is activated.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.OnActivate%2A> has no default behavior; classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView> must implement their own logic.
Notifies the designer when the view is deactivated.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.OnDeactivate%2A> has no default behavior; classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView> must implement their own logic.
Gets the name of the designer view.
A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref>.
Gets the dictionary of user data associated with the designer view.
If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.UserData%2A> is `null`, a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary> is created to hold the user data.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> that contains the user data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref>.
Gets the identifier associated with the designer view.
This property uniquely identifies a view associated with the designer.
This property must contain a unique value.
An integer that contains the identifier for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref>.
